title: Comment from Rev. James L Swarts

analysis.key_quote: Civil Servants serve as non-political employees who must remain free from becoming political pawns of the President of the United States, or any political appointee.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a non-political civil service and the dangers of politicization, as well as advocating for merit-based appointments. It reflects concerns about reverting to a system where political affiliation overshadows professional competence.
